data.title: Victory Man Productions
data.text:
1st Logo (March 30, 2012-July 15, 2016)

Visuals: Within a white bordered rectangular box against a black background, two hands open up a blue button up shirt to unveil the logo on the aforementioned background fill. The logo is shown to consist of a gradient and beveled "V M" stacked on top of one another. The logo zooms out and changes from a grainy version to a print form of itself alongside "Victory Man Productions" in white appearing underneath it.

Technique: Live-action and 2D computer animation.

Audio: The opening theme of the film.

Availability: The logo is seen on Servitude and The Missing Ingredient: What Is the Recipe for Success?.

2nd Logo (April 26, 2024)

Visuals: On a black background with gray bokeh lights, two strokes draw in a thin, metallic white version of the letters from before from left to right and right to left respectively. The upper left and bottom right-most sections of the letters have a red and blue gradient. Before the formation of the letters are finished and during their zoom-out animation, a red-blue scrolling light flash appears below it to unveil "VICTORY MAN". As the background fades to black, the fill of the text changes to a blue-white gradient and the logo flattens with the form of its gradients waving along the way.

Technique: CGI.

Audio: The opening theme of the film.
